description: Amazing Stories, volume 5, number 2 (May 1930). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Experimenter Publications, Inc. and edited by Thomas O'Conor Sloane, Ph.D. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain. Featuring: The Universe Wreckers (Edmond Hamilton; 1/3), Oh, Ye Fourth Dimension (A. S.), Synthetic (Charles Cloukey), Vis ScientiÃ¦ (Miles J. Breuer), The Gimlet (Victor Endersby), The Noise Killer (A. M. McNeill), Madness of the Dust (R. F. Starzl), The Ivy War (David H. Keller), A Circe of Science (Stanton A. Coblentz), Through the Veil (Leslie F. Stone), The Pea Vine Mystery (A. L. Hodges), and The Dead Sailor (A. L. Hodges).
